Package com.flipkart.dao

Class FlipFitAdminDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.dao.FlipFitAdminDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlipFitAdminDAOInterface
public class FlipFitAdminDAOImpl extends Object implements FlipFitAdminDAOInterface
This class implements the FlipFitAdminDAOInterface and provides functionality to interact with the database for administrative tasks.
